content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ get the yarn at wecrochet click here for yarn brava tweed worsted 6 ** the **granny all the way crochet ornament collection** is a delightful set of seven classic christmas ornament designs each beautifully crafted using the timeless granny stitch in cheerful colorwork row **get the matching granny all the way crochet stocking collection here ** https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/granny-all-the-way-stocking these patterns bring a joyful nostalgic touch to holiday decor celebrating the coziness and charm of traditional crochet with a modern twist each ornament radiates warmth and holiday spirit making them perfect for decorating the tree or gifting to loved ones perfect for crocheters of all levels these ornaments have detailed instructions including a full video tutorial each ornament design is worked from the bottom up in rounds starting with simple increases moving to colorwork rounds and finishing with simple decreases they re simple to make and once you get started you won t want to stop and they re a great project for those leftover yarn scraps crochet hook h 5 0mm - or size to meet gauge 1 notions removable stitch marker 2 yarn needle to weave in ends 3 scissors 4 clear ornament - walmart 5 clear ornament - amazon 6 yarn brava tweed worsted 7 97% premium acrylic 3% viscose 218yds/100g colorways shown wren wasabi mink and boysenberry yardage approximately 25-35 yds total per ornament yarn substitutions brava worsted 8 100 % premium acrylic 218yds/100g mighty stitch 9 80% acrylic 20% superwash wool 208yds/100g mary maxim starlette worsted 10 100% ultra soft acrylic 180yds/100g abbreviations blo - back loop only chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet rs - right side slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet st s - stitch es stsc - stacked single_crochet 11 ws - wrong side gauge 13 sts x 8 row = 4 x4 in granny stitch with 4 0mm hook not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 12 one size one size fits most baubles if using a smaller size bauble use a dk yarn and try a smaller hook skill level advanced beginner let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 13 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 14 facebook https //www faceboo k com/brianakdesigns/ 15 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 16 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 17 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 18 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2024 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled
